trait.name: Tunneler
entries: The worm can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d8}) piercing damage. Target must make a {@dc 19} Dexterity save, or be swallowed by the worm!

action.name: Tail Stinger
